Source code for mad

import numpy as np

BMAD_CONSTANT = 1.4826



[docs]def mad(x):
    """Calculate the median absolute deviation (MAD) of an array"""
    return BMAD_CONSTANT * np.median(np.abs(x - np.median(x)))
